app.title: Relationship with other TC 301 Standards
app.p: ISO/TC301 developed some international standards related implement EnMS, measurement of energy performance for organizations and scoring Energy management activities.

ISO 50001 specifies the requirements for establishing, implementing, maintaining and improving the energy managements system (EnMS). iso:pub:std:DIS:69426ISO 50001ISO 50005 provides guidance for organization to establish a phased approach to implement an EnMS.

On the other hand, this document provides guidelines to measure the status of the EnMS. Targets of this measurement are structures of EnMS and activities to improve organizations’ energy performance with referred iso:pub:std:DIS:69426ISO 50001 requirements and results of energy performance indicators (EnPIs) or energy savings. This management system includes both EnMS which are certified according to iso:pub:std:DIS:69426ISO 50001 and which are not certified. There are advanced items included which go beyond the requirements ofiso:pub:std:DIS:69426ISO 50001.
